ValidationRule.description: Once advice has been presented, it cannot be moved back to a status that corresponds to advice being non-presented. There are key controls tied to the fact advice has been presented as this is when more regulatory commitment becomes involved so
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && AdvicePresented__c && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Advice_Status__c, "Await decision") || ISPICKVAL(Advice_Status__c, "Awaiting acceptance") || ISPICKVAL(Advice_Status__c, "In fulfilment") || ISPICKVAL(Advice_Status__c, "Suitability Declined") || ISPICKVAL(Advice_Status__c, "Complete"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This advice has already been presented so cannot be moved back in the process.
